description:
Live Show Mondays brings you the conclusion of the September live show that featured Jessie Cox, Ami Emerson and special guest co-top Isis Love.

Isis is bound to the wall, naked but for her boots. The other two are planted on the "V" shaped house. The sharp edge cuts into their shaved pussies, as we bind them and cage them down. We torture the two with clothes pins and floggers. As the edge gets more unbearable by the minute, we make the others watch Isis cum and squirt like a helpless slut. Just moments ago Isis was domming, and now she is cumming like a whore and helpless to stop it.

As the other two reach the limit of their endurance we rip the final zipper off Ami and make Isis squirt in a scream orgasm one more time and call it a day. 3 hours of continuous live BDSM play is exhausting for all.
title: Jessie Cox, Ami Emerson, and Isis Love
